details.text: 13MP+2MP dual rear camera with f1.8 + f2.4, photo editing, sensor size/pixel data: 1.12 micrometer + 1.75 micrometer, consecutive capture mode: 20 in row, bokeh mode, video: 720p, 1080p, SAR auto, sensor type: CMOS | 13MP front camera

Xiaomi has provided a 15.6-inch full-HD (1920x1080 pixels) anti-glare display on the new Mi Gaming Laptop.
The display panel has 142ppi of pixel density, 72 percent NTSC colour gamut, 178-degree of wide viewing angle, and 300 nits of brightness.
There is also the 144Hz of refresh rate and 9.9mm thick bezels.
Above the display panel, the Mi Gaming Laptop 2019 has a webcam that enables HD video calling and is equipped alongside a digital array of microphones.
Gamers have also provided with two 3W speakers that support Dolby surround sound technology and Hi-Res Audio standard.

products.name: Nike’s Adapt BB shoes
products.description: Nike has unveiled its first self-lacing smart basketball shoe.

details.text: Nike has unveiled its first self-lacing smart basketball shoe.
The Adapt BB, priced at $350, does more than just lace itself. Using a power lacing system called Fit Adapt, users can adjust to find the perfect fit using the Nike Adapt mobile app.
Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum will wear the Adapt BB in the shoe’s professional debut Wednesday night when the Celtics play the Toronto Raptors.
Customization is another key feature of the Adapt BB.
The two buttons at the bottom of the shoe light up in the color of your choice while programming them, a feature that Tatum finds particularly interesting.
